meta_description: UpLift - Depression & Anxiety is a product designed to help those struggling with depression and mental health. Guided sessions, journalling advice, computerized cognitive-behavioral therapy, and much more.
paragraph: UpLift - Depression & Anxiety is an app created to help those struggling with depression and mental health. Guided sessions, journalling advice, computerized cognitive-behavioral therapy and much more. In a study, users achieved a 52% reduction in depression symptoms on average. The app has received hundreds of positive reviews from people all across the world, including doctors and mental health experts.
